sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Am I dreamin' or stupid?
I think I've been hit by cupid
But no one needs to know right now

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: I met a tall, dark and handsome man
And I've been busy makin' big plans
But no one needs to know right now

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: I got my heart set, my feet wet
But he don't even know it yet
But no one needs to know right now

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: I'll tell him someday some way somehow
But I'm gonna keep it a secret for now

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: I want bells to ring, a choir to sing
The white dress the guests the cake the car the whole darn thing
But no one needs to know right now

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: I'll tell him someday some way somehow
But I'm gonna keep it a secret for now

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: We'll have a little girl, a little boy
A little Benji we call Leroy
But no one needs to know right now

sections.name: Pont
lyrics: And I'm not lonely anymore at night
And he don't know that only he can make it right

sections.name: Solo!+1TON
lyrics: ***Solo***

sections.name: Pont!+1TON
lyrics: And I'm not lonely anymore at night
And he don't know that only he can make it right

sections.name: Outro
lyrics: I'm not dreamin' or stupid
But boy have I been hit by cupid
And no one needs to know right now
No one, no one, no one needs to know right now
No one, no one, no one needs to know oh oh right now
